messages.message: Would anyone be opposed if I skipped the converse/billing test for now? It fails ~80% of the time and I can't find a good way to make it less flaky without creating other problems :cry: We can unskip it when we migrate to metronome. cc @Victor Zeng

On a related note: I'll fix the frontend to save the license check result in localstorage and skip the check in the following page loads. This should alleviate the issue @lydia found on users having issues when opening up multiple tabs. However, this frontend fix won't help Cypress since Cypress always runs in a new browser.
